1155002.name: Azathioprine
1155002.message:
{{patient.name}} has a documented problem of Thiopurine Methyltransferase (TPMT) deficiency. TPMT is the enzyme responsible for the metabolism of azathioprine. Patients with TPMT deficiency MAY require REDUCED doses of azathioprine.

Please page the Pharmacogenomics Service (pager #7454) if further information is required.
